title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2050.1 - Purpose and scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2050.1 - Purpose and scope

State Regulations
(a) The purpose
of this Part is to enhance access to the records of the United Nations

Development Corporation (the "corporation") in the manner and to the extent
provided by law. (b) This Part
provides information concerning the procedures by which records may be
obtained. (c) Personnel of the
corporation shall furnish to the public the information and records required by
the Freedom of Information Law, as well as any records otherwise available by
law. (d) Any conflicts among laws
governing public access to records shall be construed in favor of the widest
possible availability of public records. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2050.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
